item.title: MASTODON AND ITS TOOLS
item.description:
Mastodon is a fascinating and growing platform in the world of social media that offers a fresh and user-friendly user-friendly alternative to the established networks. At its core, Mastodon is a decentralized, open source network that focuses on privacy and user control. It differs from traditional social social media through its unique structure and philosophy.
